title: Hello World
content: The "Hello, World!" phrase holds iconic status in the coding world as the quintessential beginner's program. Its simplicity and universality make it the first step for developers learning a new programming language or framework. Traditionally, the program demonstrates basic syntax and output capabilities, serving as a gentle introduction to the environment and tools. Despite its straightforward purpose, "Hello, World!" symbolizes the journey of problem-solving and creativity that coding entails. For seasoned programmers, itâ€™s a nostalgic reminder of their first line of code, while for newcomers, it represents the exciting doorway to endless possibilities in the tech universe.",
Author: Anil Kumar
